titleStmt.title: SII 12.136: original edition by V. Venkatasubba Ayyar
No. 136. (A.R. No. 53 of 1930-31). TIRUKKŌḌIKĀVAL, KUMBAKONAM TALUK, TANJORE DISTRICT. ON THE EAST WALL OF THE FIRST PRĀKĀRA (OUTSIDE) OF THE TIRUKKŌḌĪŚVARA TEMPLE.

summary.p: This inscription, dated in the 3rd year, registers a gift of 1(1/2) mā of land as tirunāmattukkāṇi to the god at Tirukkōḍikā in Nallāṟṟūr-nāḍu, a subdivision of Virudarājabhayaṅkara-vaḷanāḍu by Pākkamuḍaiyāṉ Pañchaṉ Uḍaiyapiḷḷai of Iḷamaṅgalam in Jayaṅgoṇḍaśōḻa-maṇḍalam alias Śiṅgapura-nāḍu, after purchasing it from Kautsaṉ Tribhuvanasundaraṉ Dekkaṇāmūtti-Bhaṭṭaṉ who had the Śaivāchārya-right in the temple and his younger brother Kaṟpagar alias Tribhuvanasundara-Bhaṭṭaṉ.

The details of date given in the inscription correspond to A.D. 1244, May 17, Tuesday, which, however, did not fall in the 3rd year of the chief. The details are also regular for A.D. 1234, May 9, Tuesday which would fall in the reign of the elder chief.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti śrī . cakalapuvaṉaccakkaravattikaḷ śrīkopperuñciṅkatevarkku yāṇṭu 3ṟāvatu Iṣabhanāyaṟṟu pūrvapakṣattu daśamimiyum cevvāykkiḻamaiyum peṟṟa Attattunāḷ virutarācapayaṅkaravaḷanāṭṭu
nallāṟṟūrnāṭṭu Uṭaiyār tirukkoṭikāvuṭaiyār koyilil Āticaṇṭeśvaratevar kaṉmikaḷukku jayaṅkoṇṭacoḻamaṇṭalamāṉa ciṅkapuranāṭṭu Iḷamaṅkalattuk kāṇiyuṭaiya pāk
kamuṭaiyāṉ pañcaṉ Uṭaiyapiḷḷaiyeṉ Iṉṉāyaṉārkku tirunāmattukkāṇiyāka nirvārttuk kuṭutta nilattukku piramāṇaicaivutiṭṭuk kuṭutta paricāvatu . Iṉṉāyaṉār tevatāṉam tirukkoṭikkā
k kiḻaittiruvīti vālnīḷattu Ikkoyil caivācāriyam kauTsaṉ tiripuvaṉacuntaraṉ tekkaṇāmuttipaṭṭaṉum Ivaṉtampi kaṟpakarāṉa tiripuvaṉacuntarapaṭṭaṉum pakkal vilai koṇṭuṭaiyeṉāy Eṉ
ṉutāyirunta nilamāy Iṉṉāyaṉārkku tirunāmattukkāṇiyākak kuṭutta nilattukkuk kiḻpāṟ kellai tiṉacintāmaṇipurattu viyāpārikaḷ nilattukku meṟkkum teṉpāṟkellai Ālā
lalacuntaraṉ tirunantavaṉattukku vaṭakkum melpāṟkellai tiruvīti vālnīḷattukkuk kiḻakkum vaṭa pāṟkellai Āṉāṅkūruṭaiyāṉ kollai nilattukkuk teṟkkum Iṉṉāṉkellaiyuḷ naṭuvu
paṭṭa mikutikkuṟai vuṭpaṭa � Iṉilam Orumāvaraiyum tirunāmattukkāṇiyāka nīrvārttuk kuṭutteṉ Aticaṇṭeśvaratevakaṉmikaḷukku pākkamuṭaiyāṉ pañcaṉ Uṭaiya piḷḷaiyeṉ Iṉṉi
lattu melnokkiṉa maramum kiḻṉokkiṉa kiṇaṟum potuvum potāriyum Epperpaṭṭa Uri maika ḷakappatṭa tiruṉāmattukkāṇiyākak kuṭutteṉ . Iṉṉilattukku Ikkoyil tāṉattār veṇṭiṉapote
piramāṇam paṇṇikkuṭukka kaṭaveṉākavum kuṭuttileṉākil Ippiramāṇaicaivutiṭṭe piramāṇa māvatākavum Ippaṭi cammatittu piramāṇaicaivutiṭṭuk kuṭutteṉ Uṭaiyār tirukkoṭi kāvuṭaiyārkoyil Āti
caṇṭeśvaratevakaṉmikaḷukku pākkamuṭaiyāṉ pañcaṉ Uṭaiyapiḷḷaiyeṉ . Itu pākkamuṭaiyāṉ pañcaṉ Uṭaiyapiḷḷai sajñaiyāṉamaikku Ivar marumakaṉ kuḻalūruṭaiyāṉ Eḻuttu . Ippaṭi Aṟiveṉ ṉittavinota
vaḷanāṭṭu Āvūrkūṟṟattu neṭuvāyiluṭaiyāṉ civalokaṉ Āḷavaṉtāṉen ....
Digital edition of SII 12.136 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Emmanuel Francis.
